author: Special Correspondent
text:
Congress Working Committee (CWC) member A.K. Antony will be the Congress candidate in the March 21 biennial Rajya Sabha election, KPCC president V.M. Sudheeran announced here on Saturday.

The Congress has already allotted the second of the three seats going to the polls to Janata Dal (United) which will be represented by its State president M.P. Veerendrakumar.
title: Antony to be Cong. candidate for RS
